channel.title: Just small question
channel.description: like on noobscape 2.0 how exactly would you let people log on there since don't have distributed client, would you just send out the client? and if i got vps or what not would that the client i send for people to download, thanks

item.title: Just small question

item.description:

so if i had a dedi or vps i put that providers ip address in client and pass out correcT?

item.title: Just small question

item.description:
@darscape wrote:

IP to bind the server to is set in java and not in any settings file with EasyRSC servers.
